name: Mortar Howl
description: Take on the role of an arrow from a mortar and destroy all your enemies
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 1.2GHz or faster processor Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Video card must be1024 MB or more and should be a DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
